_header: I shall pray for his soul that God give him rest
_description: On prayer for the souls of the dead — two couplets

StPauls9Dxix.Transcription:
Ichill pray for hys sowle þat God gyff hym restAnd ichill hop
                    for his sowle for for þat con I bestHe nold noȝt do for hym self
                    whylys he was on lyueAnd if I do for hys sowle smal mote I
                    þryue

‘MS 8’ in Ker  and  Piper, eds (1969)
